茥字的基本解释

茥
guī
覆盆子，一种落叶灌木，小核果红色，可食和入药。

茥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》古攜切，平齊，見。］
覆盆子。果可食和入药。
[②]［guì］
［《集韻》涓惠切，去霽，見。］
同“蓕1”。
草名。

茥字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　茥； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1028第09
【唐韻】古攜切，音圭。【爾雅·釋草】茥，蒛葐。【註】覆盆也，實似莓而小，可食。　又【說文】苦圭切，音暌。義同。　又【集韻】同蓕。

茥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
茥字的起名意思

暂无。

Fu
Basic explanation of words
Chrysanthemum
guī
Raspberry, a deciduous shrub with small red drupes, is edible and used as medicine.
Chrysanthemum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guangyun" ancient carrying cut, flat, see. ]
raspberry. The fruit is edible and used as medicine.
[②]［guì］
["Ji Yun" Juan Hui cut, go to Ji, see. ]
Same as "Luo 1".
Cursive name.
Chrysanthemum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　茥; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1028 Page 09
[Tang Yun] Ancient carrying cut, sound Gui. 【Erya·Shucao】Thum, cypress. [Note] Raspberry is actually small and edible like a raspberry.　[Said the text] bitter kyu cut, sound 暌. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The same as the rhyme.
Chrysanthemum
